LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Alpha_TAG.label: Alpha TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Alpha_TAG.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had an outstanding reaction to being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has phenomenal abilities compared to normal humans. Like all TAGS, {PAWN_nameDef} is more prone to mental breaks.
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Beta_TAG.label: Beta TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Beta_TAG.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had a superior outcome to being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has outstanding abilities compared to normal humans. Sadly like all TAGS, {PAWN_nameDef} is more prone to mental breaks.
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Gamma_TAG.label: Gamma TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Gamma_TAG.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had an average reaction to being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has exceptional abilities compared to normal humans. As with all TAGS, {PAWN_nameDef} is more prone to mental breaks.
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Delta_TAG.label: Delta TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Delta_TAG.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had a sub par reaction to being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has above average abilities compared to normal humans. Like all TAGS, {PAWN_nameDef} is more prone to mental breaks.
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Nuero_TAG.label: Nuero TAG
LanguageData.TAG.degreeDatas.Nuero_TAG.description: {PAWN_nameDef} had a two sided outcome from being born on Luciferium. {PAWN_pronoun} has both crippling mental issues and outstanding abilities.
